segments.text: Please tell me something about your insurance background .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I majored in international banking at college so I took many insurance courses . And I worked at an insurance company for my graduation field work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why do you want to be an insurance agent ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I care about people and I know the importance of insurance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any work experience in promotion ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do . I have worked as a salesman for P & G Company Ltd .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do people respond well to you ?
segments.speaker: S1
